title.en: Fundamentals of Quantum Computing: Theory and Practice

description.en: In quantum cryptography we use quantum mechanical effects to construct secure protocols. The paradoxical nature of quantum mechanics allows for constructions that solve problems known to be impossible without quantum mechanics. This lecture gives an introduction into this fascinating area. Possible topics include:basics of quantum computation, breaking crypto with quantum computers, quantum key distribution, quantum commitments (possibility/impossibility), quantum zero-knowledge.
description.et:
Kvantkrüptograafias me kasutame kvantmehaanika efekte turvaliste protokollide koostamiseks. Kvantmehaanika paradoksaalne olemus võimaldab konstruktsioone, mis lahendavad ülesandeid, mis ilma kvantmehaanikata ei ole lahenduvad. Antud aine annab sissejuhatuse sellesse huvitavasse
alasse. Teemadeks on: kvantarvutuse alused, kvantarvutid, kvantvõtme jaotamine.

objectives.en: Acquire an understanding of the basic methods and tools in quantum cryptography
objectives.et: Omandada ülevaade ja arusaamine kvantkrüptograafia põhimeetoditest ja vahenditest

learning_outcomes.en: After passing the course the student
* knows quantum mechanics, quantum computing, and quantum cryptography
* understands how quantum mechanics allows us to create protocols that achieve tasks hitherto impossible
learning_outcomes.et: * saab aru, kuidas kvantmehaanika võimaldab luua protokolle, mis lahendavad ülesandeid, mis olid senini lahendamata.

learning_outcomes.en: * understands the mathematical formalisms required to prove the security of quantum cryptographic protocols
learning_outcomes.et: * saab aru matemaatilistest formalismidest, mis on vajalikud kvantkrüptograafia protokollide turvalisuse tõestamiseks.
